hotel_name: The Westin Las Vegas Hotel & Spa
review_text: Good: Nice breakfast with 5 bottomless mimosas. Very nice and helpful staff. Loved the option to forego room service and get a 5 voucher for use at the hotel. Bed and bedding was very comfortable. The ice cold cucumber and berry water in the lobby was always a welcome sight after returning to the hotel.
review_title: Enjoyed the stay. Good price and location.
